title: Zonbi the doll
creator_credit: Multimedia Design, Faculty of Design, Swinburne University of Technology and Cam Panlock
brief_description: This dark 2D animation features a battered little doll in a gloomy prison. When the lid to his box is opened, what happens to Zonbi? WARNING: Some scenes may disturb younger viewers
